184269806.review: i grew up playing this game, i am highly nostalgic for it and i absolutely love it, wish they would make a third supreme commander back in this art-style or a remaster would be fine. 10/10

184266293.review: THE RTS to the CORE! Northgard ? BAH, Total War? BAH. Company of Heroes? BAAAH... After the glorius Total Annihilation, this is what defines the classic RTS genre, with the most FREEDOM what an RTS can give you. Want to dominate land, you can, rule the skies, you can, worse than the Straw Hats on the sea, you can, beat the living hell out of your enemies with Experimentals? You Can! Or want to bombard/nuke them to the Stone Age? YOU CAN! And if you want a good advice my fellow strategy lover friend, get a few mods (Black Ops, Total Mayhem, Xtrem Wars, BrewLAN, Wyvern Battle Pack, Future Battlefield Pack) and you will get units what you never ever imagined to exist to wreak havoc to your heart's content! Belive me, even if Steam only shows a few 100 hours of playtime, my real playtime is around 10 000 or more hours.

184197872.review: Everything missing or wrong in supcom is fixed in this add on game.

184037810.review: This is the best game ever

184027006.review: easily one of the best RTS ever made

183974830.review: If you love RTS games, this game is a must-play. Growing up with Red Alert 2 as a kid and later discovering Supreme Commander in a local game store, I bought it, played it, and was blown away. The battlefields are massive, the gameplay is fun, and there's an incredible amount of depth. For instance, you have multiple modes for units, and you can manually fire or aim certain weapons. The strategic possibilities are endless—enough to intimidate any seasoned general. Truly one of the best PC games ever made. Play the first one if you'r new, the first mission can be intimidating.

183892278.review:
Game was released in 2007. 17 years later still has working networking code, dual monitor support and runs on monitors whose resolution and aspect ratio had yet to be imagined.
Still Good fun

183770743.review: This amazing second instalment lives on in "Forged Alliance Forever" for multiplayer matches (FAF), and still is one of the most epic strategy games ever made in my opinion. It also has the option to use a second monitor to serve as your radar or map, while the game itself plays on your primary screen. More strategy games should have this amazing option, and can learn a thing or two from the Supreme Commander franchise.

183686198.review: Kann mann immer wieder spielen, grafik ist bis zum heutigen tag noch akzeptal modern, und ich bin mies drin.

183586999.review:
I played Total Annihilation years ago and as I got busy with life; I didn’t know that Supreme Commander was the successor to one of my favorite games of all time. 
I picked Supreme Commander, Supreme Commander 2, and Supreme Commander Forged Alliance during one of Steam sales and OMG.
The tactical zoom and the scale of battles blew my mind.
Go buy all of them and play right now.
